description: A simple but so tasty salad.
name: Salami Feta Cheese & Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup red onion, very finely sliced
0.25 cup my bunch cafe italian dressing

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl add the cooked boiled pasta. You could use small pasta shells or the pin wheel shaped pasta.
Then add the diced salami, cherry tomatoes, diced feta cheese and the red onion pour. Add desired amount of salad dressing of your choice.

Cut onions super fine. Mix all the ingredients together and add some salt and pepper if desired. Sprinkle chopped parsley on top. Now this is just a base idea, you can add any foods you like or more or less of something i've added  eg you could add cooked prawns, diced boiled or roast bbq beef chicken or lamb.
I also added some cooked prawns. Yum!
